about_the_game:
A Bumpy Ride is Cosmoporium Games' breakout title! In this train-driving exploration game, you'll be tasked with managing a small railroad all alone. Drive the train, hire your crew, and take passengers where they want to go! Explore and reveal new areas on your map, spurred on by passengers' requests to go to places you might not recognize.

Features include:

  • A little locomotive with customizable paint job
  • Unlockable new train cars, such as a first class car or a gondola car for freight
  • A level-up system tied to unlocking new upgrades, staff, and skins
  • An expansive world, with many classic American-inspired vistas
  • Full day/night cycle & day-based progression

We hope you'll join us for our journey in A Bumpy Ride!

name: A Bumpy Ride
short_description: Take a jaunt into the world of A Bumpy Ride, a casual train-driving and exploration game! Inspired by railroading of the 19th century with a whimsical spin, you'll adventure around the open frontier in your trusty little train, picking up passengers and freight.
